name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location
author: @AitYunivers

values.name: Night
values.description: What night the player is currently on.

values.name: Star 1
values.description: The first star, obtained for beating Night 5.

values.name: Star 2
values.description: The second star, obtained for beating the minigame.

values.name: Star 3
values.description: The third star, obtained for beating the backroom.

values.name: Angry Ballet
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Angry Ballet' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Freddy & Co.
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Freddy & Co.' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Funtime Frenzy
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Funtime Frenzy' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Dolls, Attack!
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Dolls, Attack!' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Girls' Night
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Girls' Night' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Weirdos
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Weirdos' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Top Shelf
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Top Shelf' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Bottom Shelf
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Bottom Shelf' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Cupcake Challenge
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Cupcake Challenge' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Golden Freddy
values.description: A slider representing the 4 stars you get for beating 'Golden Freddy' on all 4 difficulties

values.name: Play Intro
values.description: Whether or not to play the opening intro.

values.name: Last Cutscene
values.description: The ID of the previous cutscene the player encountered.
